Detailed Description

Class which provides methods for rendering image data.

REAL  y4 
)

Draw a bezier spline

Status AggOO::Graphics::DrawBeziers ( const Pen *  pen,
const Point *  points,
INT  count 
)

Draw a sequence of bezier splines

Remarks:
Each bezier spline is made of 4 points. The first and fourth points are the end-points, and the second and third are the control points. When adding multiple splines, the fourth point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 4 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 3, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.

Status AggOO::Graphics::DrawBeziers ( const Pen *  pen,
const PointF *  points,
INT  count 
)

Draw a sequence of bezier splines

Remarks:
Each bezier spline is made of 4 points. The first and fourth points are the end-points, and the second and third are the control points. When adding multiple splines, the fourth point of the previous spline is used as the first point of the current spline. In other words, the first 4 points in the array are used for the first spline, the next 3, along with the last point from the first spline, are used for the second spline, and so on.
